root.name: The Boggit
root.description: "The Boggit: Bored Too" was a text based adventure spoof based on the "The Hobbit" by J. R. R. Tolkien. A follow-up game to "Bored of the Rings." The plot is based loosely on The Hobbit but takes many surreal twists and every opportunity to poke fun at Tolkien's world as Bimbo Faggins encounters Grandalf the Wizard, Thorny the Dwarf and various other weird characters on his way to the Wiffy Mountains.The game also included the bonus program "Sceptical II." A spoof version of the teletext service available on UK television.
